item.title: Self-Study in August 2023
item.description: Elixir saves Pinterest M a year in server costs An example of how rewriting a microservice from AWS Lambda to elixir can save 97% of server costs. From 150 servers to 5. https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37304851 Tags: imported, hacker-news, elixir, rewrite, jose-valim, aws, cost, aws-gateway, serverless, lambda, microservice Id: 41419550-46fc-11ee-bfbe-0242ac110002 Read: Tue Aug 29 08:30:52 2023
